title: 324: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 5 (High Maintenance Martin + Are Producers Leading Us On? + Bach Nation News!)
itunes:title: 324: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 5 (High Maintenance Martin + Are Producers Leading Us On? + Bach Nation News!)
description:
The Broads are back to recap - but first they cover some big Bach Nation News aka Pilot Pete/Hannah Brown. Then they dive into Michelle’s latest episode! They rage over Martin, feel baffled by Chris S, hear reruns from Clayton, discuss Nayte and Joe being the clear front runners, breakdown why they think producers may be leading us on with the final rose, make their top 4 guesses, and more!
